array-basics.prompt: What is the time complexity of accessing arr[i] in a static array?
array-basics.explanation: Static arrays offer constant-time random access by index.

sorting-basics.prompt: Bubble sort performs swaps until the array is:
sorting-basics.explanation: In the best case after passes, the array is sorted.

graph-bfs.explanation: A first-in-first-out queue processes layers of neighbors.
